title: Can I use the Macbook Pro's 61w USB C charger with my Pixel 2?
content:
I've found that there's an official 45w USB-C power adapter from Google, and I have a 61w USB-C power adapter from my Macbook. Can I use it to charge my pixel 2? 

If there's a 45w , overpower output shouldn't be an issue now. Now I use the 18w power adapter.
